abstract.para: The topic describes basics of the Compose tool.

section.title: What is Compose?
section.para: Compose is a tool for managing multi-container applications. Compose enables you to have multiple isolated environment on a single host, recreate only those containers that have changed and supporit variables between environments.

section.title: How does Compose work?
section.para: First, you need to create a YAML file that define your application. In the file, you need to define the following components:

listitem.para: A service is a computing component of the application. It is a run of a container image with a partiular configuration.
Networks define IP routes between services.
A directory where services store and shares data.

section.para: You may also need to use a list of environment variables that will be passed to your services.
After you create the YAML file, you can manage your compose application using the compose CLI.
